title: Cruciform House in Pennsylvania
medium: charcoal and crayon on paper mounted on card
credit_line: Gift of Mr. and Mrs. James H. Beal
provenance_text:
Charles E. Burchfield [1893-1967], West Seneca, NY, until 1953; Mr. [1898-1987] and Mrs. James H. Beal (born Rebecca Huebley Jones) [1898-1993], Pittsburgh, PA, November 1953 until April 1967 [1]; their gift to Museum of Art, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, April 1967.

Notes:
[1]. Purchased by Mrs. Beal from the exhibition "The Drawings of Charles E. Burchfield," Print Club of Cleveland and Cleveland Museum of Art, November-December 1953 (no. 110, illustrated.) See Mrs. Beal's annotated copy of the exhibition catalogue and "The Beal Collection of American Art," Carnegie Museum of Art, 1994.

creator.death_place: West Seneca (Erie county, New York state, United States)
